property.name: Description
property.value: Cdd_NAD_PowerControl_Init function check

property.name: Description
property.value: Cdd_NAD_PowerControl_Cyclic10ms function check with NAD_ON new request

property.name: Test_Step_0
property.value: NAD power state is IDLE, application new request is IDLE

property.name: Test_Step_1
property.value: NAD power state is IDLE, application new request is NAD ON

property.name: Test_Step_2
property.value: NAD power state is Boot_restart

property.name: Test_Step_3
property.value: NAD power state is voltage regulator off

property.name: Test_Step_4
property.value: NAD power state is check phy on

property.name: Test_Step_5
property.value: NAD power state is prepare startup

property.name: Test_Step_6
property.value: NAD power state is prepare startup for 300 ms

property.name: Test_Step_7
property.value: NAD power state pass to enabled state after 300 ms is elapsed

property.name: Test_Step_8
property.value: NAD power state is enabled, and timer NAD on (1000 ms ) is triggered

property.name: Test_Step_9
property.value: NAD power state is enabled for 1000 ms

property.name: Test_Step_10
property.value: NAD power state pass to ON state after 1000 ms is elapsed

property.name: Test_Step_11
property.value: NAD power state pass to IDLE state

property.name: Description
property.value: Cdd_NAD_PowerControl_Cyclic10ms function check with NAD_OFF new request

property.name: Test_Step_0
property.value: NAD power state is IDLE, application new request is NAD OFF

property.name: Test_Step_1
property.value: NAD power state is prepare OFF

property.name: Test_Step_2
property.value: NAD power state is prepare OFF for 4000 ms

property.name: Test_Step_3
property.value: NAD power state pass to disable voltage regulator state after 4000 ms is elapsed

property.name: Test_Step_4
property.value: NAD power state is prepare disable voltage regulator for 500 ms

property.name: Test_Step_5
property.value: NAD power state is OFF after 500 ms is elapsed.

property.name: Test_Step_6
property.value: NAD power state is OFF with no Hard reset requested

property.name: Description
property.value: Cdd_NAD_PowerControl_SetDio_NAD_WAKE function check

property.name: Description
property.value: Cdd_NAD_PowerControl_process_NAD_WAKE function check

property.name: Description
property.value: Cdd_NAD_PowerControl_Cyclic10ms function check with normal reset new request

property.name: Test_Step_0
property.value: NAD power state is IDLE, application new request is IDLE

property.name: Test_Step_1
property.value: NAD power state is IDLE, application new request is normal reset

property.name: Test_Step_2
property.value: NAD power state is prepare normal reset for 100 ms

property.name: Test_Step_3
property.value: NAD power state is normal reset done after 100 ms is elapsed.

property.name: Test_Step_4
property.value: NAD power state pass to IDLE state

property.name: Description
property.value: Cdd_NAD_PowerControl_Cyclic10ms function check with hard reset new request

property.name: Test_Step_0
property.value: NAD power state is IDLE, application new request is IDLE

property.name: Test_Step_1
property.value: NAD power state is IDLE, application new request is hard reset

property.name: Test_Step_2
property.value: NAD power state is prepare OFF

property.name: Test_Step_3
property.value: NAD power state is prepare OFF for 4000 ms

property.name: Test_Step_4
property.value: NAD power state pass to disable voltage regulator state after 4000 ms is elapsed

property.name: Test_Step_5
property.value: NAD power state is prepare disable voltage regulator for 500 ms

property.name: Test_Step_6
property.value: NAD power state is OFF after 500 ms is elapsed.

property.name: Test_Step_7
property.value: NAD power state is OFF with Hard reset requested

property.name: Description
property.value: Cdd_NAD_PowerControl_Cyclic10ms function check with recovery reset new request

property.name: Test_Step_0
property.value: NAD power state is IDLE, application new request is IDLE

property.name: Test_Step_1
property.value: NAD power state is IDLE, application new request is recovery reset

property.name: Test_Step_2
property.value: NAD power state is Prepare recovery reset

property.name: Test_Step_3
property.value: NAD power state is recovery reset for 101000 ms

property.name: Test_Step_4
property.value: NAD power state pass to recovery reset done state after 10100 ms is elapsed

property.name: Test_Step_5
property.value: NAD power state pass IDLE state
